For x86:
export CFLAGS=-m32
export LDFLAGS=-m32
export CPPFLAGS=-m32

1. Sqlite:
cd sqlite-autoconf-3090200
setarch i386 ./config --prefix=<dir> -m32 shared
make
make install

2. openssl:
cd openssl-1.0.2d
./Configure --prefix=<dir> linux-generic32 shared
make
make install

3. boost:
cd boost_1_59_0
./bootstrap.sh
./b2 --prefix=<dir> address-model=32 install

4. cpp-netlib
cd cpp-netlib-0.11.2-final
mkdir cpp-netlib-build
cd cpp-netlib-build
export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=<openssl lib pkgconfig path>
cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug \
      -DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=gcc \
      -DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER=g++ \
      -DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS=-m32 \
      -DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=-m32 \
      -DBOOST_ROOT=<dir> \
      -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=<dir> \
      ..
make
make install

5. libnl
export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=<openssl lib pkgconfig path>
./configure --prefix=<dir>
make
make install

cd aircrack-ng-1.2-rc3
make
./install.sh  <installdir>

For x86-64:

1. Sqlite:
cd sqlite-autoconf-3090200
./configure --prefix=<dir>
make
make install

2. openssl:
cd openssl-1.0.2d
./Configure --prefix=<dir> linux-x86_64 shared
make
make install

3. boost:
cd boost_1_59_0
./bootstrap.sh
./b2 --prefix=<dir> install

4. cpp-netlib
cd cpp-netlib-0.11.2-final
mkdir cpp-netlib-build
cd cpp-netlib-build
export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=<openssl lib pkgconfig path>
cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug \
      -DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=gcc \
      -DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER=g++ \
      -DBOOST_ROOT=<boost_dir> \
      -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=<dir> \
      ..
make
make install

5. libnl
export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=<openssl lib pkgconfig path>
./configure --prefix=<dir>
make
make install

6. aircrack-ng
cd aircrack-ng-1.2-rc3
export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=<openssl lib pkgconfig path>:<libnl lib pkgconfig path>
make
./install.sh  <installdir>

For cross compile:
1. Sqlite:
cd sqlite-autoconf-3090200
./configure --prefix=<dir> --host=arm-linux-gnueabihf
make
make install

2. openssl:
cd openssl-1.0.2d
./Configure --prefix=<dir> shared -fPIC os/compiler:arm-linux-gnueabihf-gcc
make
make install

3. boost:
cd boost_1_59_0
#user-config.jam contains the information of toolchain.
#modify it to your toolchain
export BOOST_BUILD_USER_CONFIG=tools/build/user-config.jam
./bootstrap.sh
./b2 toolset=gcc-arm install --prefix=<dir>

4. cpp-netlib
cd cpp-netlib-0.11.2-final
mkdir cpp-netlib-build
cd cpp-netlib-build
export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=<openssl lib pkgconfig path>
cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug \
      -DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=arm-linux-gnueabihf-gcc \
      -DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER=arm-linux-gnueabihf-g++ \
      -DBOOST_ROOT=<boost_dir> \
      -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=<dir> \
      ..
make
make install

5. libnl
./configure --prefix=<dir> --host=arm-linux-gnueabihf
make
make install

6. aircrack-ng
cd aircrack-ng-1.2-rc2
export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=<openssl lib pkgconfig path>:<libnl lib pkgconfig path>
TOOL_PREFIX=arm-linux-gnueabihf-  make
./install.sh <installdir>
